allTickets.title: Set up authentication system (free tier MVP)
allTickets.description:
âœ… COMPLETED

## Implemented:

* Supabase authentication integration using shared backend
* AuthContext for global authentication state management
* Sign in/sign up screens with proper validation
* Authentication-aware navigation (AuthNavigator)
* Free tier user registration with metadata
* Session persistence and automatic refresh
* Proper error handling with user-friendly messages
* Placeholder screens for testing navigation flow

## Features:

* Email/password authentication
* Form validation (email format, password strength)
* Loading states and error feedback
* Automatic navigation based on auth state
* Session management with Supabase
* Free tier user tagging

## Files Created:

* /src/services/supabase.ts - Supabase client and auth helpers
* /src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx - Authentication state management
* /src/navigation/AuthNavigator.tsx - Auth-aware routing
* .env - Environment variables for Supabase
* Updated LoginScreen and HomeScreen with real auth

Ready for camera component implementation.

allTickets.title: Add user feedback system for quote refinement
allTickets.description:
Allow users to provide feedback on quotes and regenerate with specific rates.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Create feedback interface on quote results
- [ ] Allow users to adjust material preferences
- [ ] Enable labor rate customization
- [ ] Add tool hire preference selection
- [ ] Implement quote regeneration with user inputs
- [ ] Store user preferences for future quotes
- [ ] Add feedback collection for AI training

allTickets.title: Implement context-aware pricing system
allTickets.description:
Build middleware to incorporate real-time pricing data for accurate quotes.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Integrate tool hire rates data
- [ ] Add material pricing data
- [ ] Include aggregate rates
- [ ] Incorporate labor rates by region
- [ ] Create pricing data management system
- [ ] Implement real-time rate updates
- [ ] Add fallback pricing when data unavailable
- [ ] Create pricing configuration interface

allTickets.title: Build AI-agnostic middleware for quote generation

- [ ] Handle provider-specific formatting
- [ ] Implement fallback logic
- [ ] Add configuration for provider selection

allTickets.title: ðŸ”„ Extract business logic from Next.js to Supabase Functions
allTickets.description:
## ARCHITECTURE UPDATE: Supabase Edge Functions âœ…

## Objective

Extract and port business logic from Next.js API routes to Supabase Edge Functions.

## Why Supabase Edge Functions?

- âœ… Better integration with existing Supabase infrastructure
- âœ… Global edge deployment for performance
- âœ… TypeScript/Deno runtime (not Node.js)
- âœ… Built-in auth and database access

## Current Next.js Locations to Extract

- /app/api/analyze/ â†’ `gemini-analysis` function âœ… Started
- /app/api/chat/ â†’ `chat` function (placeholder created)
- /app/api/pricing/ â†’ `construction-pricing` function âœ… Started

## Tasks

- [ ] Extract GeminiService logic from Next.js analyze route
- [ ] Port PricingService logic to construction-pricing function
- [ ] Extract chat logic and conversation handling
- [ ] Port tool hire business logic
- [ ] Add Contentful integration for pricing data
- [ ] Implement proper error handling and logging

## Business Logic to Port

- AI prompt engineering and image analysis
- Cost calculation algorithms
- UK pricing data processing
- Tool recommendation logic
- Safety requirement databases

## Dependencies

- âœ… Supabase Edge Functions created
- [ ] Environment variables configured in Supabase
- [ ] GEMINI_API_KEY added to Supabase secrets

This task now focuses on Supabase/Deno instead of NestJS/Node.js.

allTickets.title: ðŸ”Œ Set up Supabase Edge Functions API âœ… COMPLETED
allTickets.description:
## âœ… COMPLETED - Supabase Edge Functions API Layer

## Architecture Decision: Supabase Edge Functions âœ…

Chose Supabase over NestJS for better integration with existing infrastructure.

## Why Supabase Edge Functions?

* âœ… Already using Supabase database
* âœ… Built-in auth integration
* âœ… Global edge deployment
* âœ… TypeScript/Deno runtime
* âœ… Single ecosystem, lower costs

## Completed API Endpoints

* `/functions/v1/gemini-analysis` - AI construction analysis
* `/functions/v1/construction-pricing` - UK materials and labor rates
* `/functions/v1/tool-hire` - Tool rental recommendations
* `/functions/v1/chat` - AI conversational interface

## Features Implemented

* âœ… CORS handling for mobile app integration
* âœ… TypeScript interfaces and validation
* âœ… Error handling and logging
* âœ… Mock UK pricing data (Travis Perkins, Wickes, Selco)
* âœ… Labor rates by region and trade
* âœ… Environment configuration structure

## Repository Structure

```
/supabase/functions/
â”œâ”€â”€ _shared/cors.ts        # CORS utilities
â”œâ”€â”€ gemini-analysis/       # AI analysis endpoint
â”œâ”€â”€ construction-pricing/  # UK pricing data API
â”œâ”€â”€ tool-hire/            # Tool hire recommendations
â””â”€â”€ chat/                 # Chat interface
```

## Ready For

* Mobile app integration
* Production deployment to Supabase
* Environment variable configuration

Next: Connect mobile app to these APIs and extract business logic from web app.

allTickets.title: ðŸ“ Port SmartLocationService to mobile (with GPS)
allTickets.description:
## ARCHITECTURE UPDATE: Mobile-First for Privacy âœ…

## Objective

Port location services directly to mobile app for GPS integration and privacy.

## Why Mobile Direct?

* âœ… Needs mobile GPS permissions anyway
* âœ… Location processing can be local
* âœ… Privacy-friendly (location stays on device)
* âœ… Better offline capability

## Current Location (Web App)

/lib/location/smart-location.service.ts

## Tasks

- [ ] Port UK location detection logic to mobile
- [ ] Integrate React Native geolocation
- [ ] Add location permission handling
- [ ] Port supplier recommendation logic
- [ ] Test on both iOS and Android
- [ ] Add offline location caching

## Mobile Dependencies

* expo-location for GPS access
* AsyncStorage for location caching
* iOS/Android permission handling

## Value

Location-based recommendations with full privacy control

allTickets.title: ðŸ› ï¸ Port ToolExpertiseService to mobile (offline)
allTickets.description:
## ARCHITECTURE UPDATE: Mobile-First for Offline Use âœ…

## Objective

Port tool expertise knowledge directly to mobile app for instant offline access.

## Why Mobile Direct?

* âœ… Static knowledge base - perfect for offline use
* âœ… No API calls needed - instant responses
* âœ… 1,770 lines of pure domain knowledge
* âœ… Better user experience (no network dependency)

## Current Location (Web App)

/lib/tools/tool-expertise.service.ts

## Tasks

- [ ] Copy ToolExpertiseService to shared-services package
- [ ] Create searchable interface for mobile
- [ ] Optimize for mobile performance
- [ ] Add offline caching with AsyncStorage
- [ ] Create tool recommendation engine
- [ ] Build tool search and filtering

## Mobile Integration

* Import directly in mobile app
* Store in AsyncStorage for fast access
* Enable offline tool recommendations

## Value

Gold mine of domain expertise - critical competitive advantage that works without internet

allTickets.title: ðŸ”¨ Build ConstructionDataService API endpoints
allTickets.description:
## ARCHITECTURE UPDATE: API-First Approach âœ…

## Objective

Create NestJS API endpoints for UK construction pricing data (moved from direct mobile integration for performance and updates).

## Why API Layer?

* âœ… Large datasets better served from API
* âœ… Enable pricing updates without app releases
* âœ… Add caching and CDN support
* âœ… Real-time pricing synchronization

## Current Location (Web App)

/lib/construction-data/construction-data.service.ts

## Tasks

- [ ] Extract construction data to NestJS service
- [ ] Create /api/pricing endpoints
- [ ] Implement data caching strategy
- [ ] Add real-time pricing updates
- [ ] Create search and filtering endpoints

## API Endpoints to Create

* GET /api/pricing/materials - Get material costs
* GET /api/pricing/labor - Get labor rates by region
* GET /api/pricing/categories - Get pricing categories
* GET /api/pricing/search - Search pricing data

## Dependencies

* Requires ASK-12 (NestJS setup) to be completed first

## Value

Essential UK market data - 100% reusable with better performance

allTickets.title: ðŸ¤– Build GeminiService API endpoints
allTickets.description:
## ARCHITECTURE UPDATE: API-First Approach âœ…

## Objective

Create NestJS API endpoints for Google Gemini AI service (moved from direct mobile integration for security and performance).

## Why API Layer?

* âœ… Keep API keys secure on server
* âœ… Enable rate limiting and caching
* âœ… Heavy AI processing on backend
* âœ… Better error handling

## Current Location (Web App)

/lib/ai/gemini.service.ts

## Tasks

- [ ] Extract GeminiService to NestJS controller
- [ ] Create /api/analysis endpoints
- [ ] Add image upload handling
- [ ] Implement error handling and validation
- [ ] Add rate limiting for AI calls
- [ ] Cache common analysis results

## API Endpoints to Create

* POST /api/analysis/image - Upload and analyze construction images
* POST /api/chat/message - AI chat responses
* GET /api/analysis/:id - Get analysis results

## Dependencies

* Requires ASK-12 (NestJS setup) to be completed first

## Value

Core AI differentiator - enables secure AI-powered construction analysis

allTickets.title: Set up your teams (2)
allTickets.description:
This workspace is a container for your organizationâ€™s work.Â 

* [Learn more about Workspaces](https://linear.app/docs/workspaces)
  How to configure settings and workflowsÂ 

Teams are how you organize people and work in Linear.

* [Learn about Teams](https://linear.app/docs/teams)
  How to structure teams and configure workflows

Teams are made of members with defined roles (Admin, Member, Guest).

* [Learn more about Members](https://linear.app/docs/invite-members)
  Add your team and assign roles

---

Ready to add your team? Invite via CSV or a unique link in [settings](http://linear.app/settings/members).

allTickets.title: Get familiar with Linear (1)
allTickets.description:
Welcome to Linear!Â 

Watch an introductory video and access a list of resources below.

[LinearH264Version.mp4](https://uploads.linear.app/fe63b3e2-bf87-46c0-8784-cd7d639287c8/923e2801-e5f2-4055-9b27-1541f27e3365/44ab081a-253a-4ccf-8d3d-2547ac09b986)

### **Choose your setup guide** based on your company stage:

* [Small teams](https://linear.app/docs/how-to-use-linear-small-teams)
  For early-stage startups and projects
* [Startups & mid-size companies](https://linear.app/docs/how-to-use-linear-startups-mid-size-companies)
  For growing teams with cross-functional needs
* [Large & scaling companies](https://linear.app/docs/how-to-use-linear-large-scaling-companies)
  For enterprise and high-growth teams with complex workflows

### **Need help getting started?**

* [Join our Slack community](https://linear.app/join-slack)
  Connect with other Linear users and get tips
* [Join a live ](https://lu.ma/welcome-to-linear?utm_source=docs)[onboarding](https://lu.ma/welcome-to-linear?utm_source=onboarding)[ ](https://lu.ma/welcome-to-linear?utm_source=docs)[session](https://lu.ma/welcome-to-linear?utm_source=onboarding)
  Learn the essentials and see demos of core workflows

---

If you have any questions hit `?` in the bottom left > Contact us.

![contactlinear (1).gif](https://uploads.linear.app/fe63b3e2-bf87-46c0-8784-cd7d639287c8/bc9bbf62-4192-411f-88f6-c89c9150503e/4df0346e-803b-4f58-8527-4aeb30d88411)

allTickets.title: Import your data (4)
allTickets.description:
Sync data between Linear and your other tools.

![import-your-data.png](https://uploads.linear.app/fe63b3e2-bf87-46c0-8784-cd7d639287c8/80d7e050-dd1f-4d4f-8257-b29c16087017/65c16454-30f3-4f4a-8f25-c2428d64ff57)

Whether you're exploring Linear, running a pilot, or ready for full migration, weâ€™ve got you covered.Â 

### **Exploring Linear:**

* [**Pitch Linear**](https://linear.app/switch/pitch-guide)
  Build your business case and get organizational buy-in
* [**Run a pilot**](https://linear.app/switch/pilot-guide)
  Test Linear with a small team before rolling out company-wide

### **Ready to migrate:**

* [**Migration guide**](https://linear.app/switch/migration-guide) 
  Step-by-step process for importing data and rolling out Linear

---

If you have any questions hit `?` in the bottom left > Contact us.

![contactlinear (1).gif](https://uploads.linear.app/fe63b3e2-bf87-46c0-8784-cd7d639287c8/191f6985-8562-4f62-9482-a094b69c4756/0e4ff63b-3da2-4699-912b-04afb68511e8)

allTickets.title: Connect your tools (3)
allTickets.description:
Integrations turn Linear into your source of truth around product development. Keep data in sync, and eliminate manual updates between tools.

![connect-your-tools.png](https://uploads.linear.app/fe63b3e2-bf87-46c0-8784-cd7d639287c8/c2eae035-37e2-4754-adcb-b8305431aa1f/c92d70c7-e6d0-4fa2-a0fd-78f6e780993a)

### **Key integrations**

* [**Slack**](https://linear.app/settings/integrations/slack)
  Create issues from Slack messages and sync threads
* [**GitHub**](https://linear.app/settings/integrations/github)** / **[**GitLab**](https://linear.app/settings/integrations/gitlab)
  Automate your pull request, commit workflows, and keep issues synced both ways
* [**Agents**](https://linear.app/integrations/agents)
  Deploy AI agents that work alongside you as teammates

### **Browse all integrations**

Discover 150+ available connections in our [integration directory](https://linear.app/integrations) â€“ from bug creation via support tools (Intercom, Zendesk), to issues created from design explorations (Figma).

### **Linear API**

If you need something more custom, you can build directly on the Linear API (built on GraphQL). [See our Dev Docs to learn more](https://linear.app/developers).

mobileTickets.title: ðŸ”Œ Set up Supabase Edge Functions API âœ… COMPLETED
mobileTickets.description:
## âœ… COMPLETED - Supabase Edge Functions API Layer

## Architecture Decision: Supabase Edge Functions âœ…

Chose Supabase over NestJS for better integration with existing infrastructure.

## Why Supabase Edge Functions?

* âœ… Already using Supabase database
* âœ… Built-in auth integration
* âœ… Global edge deployment
* âœ… TypeScript/Deno runtime
* âœ… Single ecosystem, lower costs

## Completed API Endpoints

* `/functions/v1/gemini-analysis` - AI construction analysis
* `/functions/v1/construction-pricing` - UK materials and labor rates
* `/functions/v1/tool-hire` - Tool rental recommendations
* `/functions/v1/chat` - AI conversational interface

## Features Implemented

* âœ… CORS handling for mobile app integration
* âœ… TypeScript interfaces and validation
* âœ… Error handling and logging
* âœ… Mock UK pricing data (Travis Perkins, Wickes, Selco)
* âœ… Labor rates by region and trade
* âœ… Environment configuration structure

## Repository Structure

```
/supabase/functions/
â”œâ”€â”€ _shared/cors.ts        # CORS utilities
â”œâ”€â”€ gemini-analysis/       # AI analysis endpoint
â”œâ”€â”€ construction-pricing/  # UK pricing data API
â”œâ”€â”€ tool-hire/            # Tool hire recommendations
â””â”€â”€ chat/                 # Chat interface
```

## Ready For

* Mobile app integration
* Production deployment to Supabase
* Environment variable configuration

Next: Connect mobile app to these APIs and extract business logic from web app.

mobileTickets.title: ðŸ“ Port SmartLocationService to mobile (with GPS)
mobileTickets.description:
## ARCHITECTURE UPDATE: Mobile-First for Privacy âœ…

## Objective

Port location services directly to mobile app for GPS integration and privacy.

## Why Mobile Direct?

* âœ… Needs mobile GPS permissions anyway
* âœ… Location processing can be local
* âœ… Privacy-friendly (location stays on device)
* âœ… Better offline capability

## Current Location (Web App)

/lib/location/smart-location.service.ts

## Tasks

- [ ] Port UK location detection logic to mobile
- [ ] Integrate React Native geolocation
- [ ] Add location permission handling
- [ ] Port supplier recommendation logic
- [ ] Test on both iOS and Android
- [ ] Add offline location caching

## Mobile Dependencies

* expo-location for GPS access
* AsyncStorage for location caching
* iOS/Android permission handling

## Value

Location-based recommendations with full privacy control

* âœ… Static knowledge base - perfect for offline use
* âœ… No API calls needed - instant responses

/lib/tools/tool-expertise.service.ts

## Value

mobileTickets.title: ðŸ”¨ Build ConstructionDataService API endpoints
mobileTickets.description:
## ARCHITECTURE UPDATE: API-First Approach âœ…

## Objective

Create NestJS API endpoints for UK construction pricing data (moved from direct mobile integration for performance and updates).

## Why API Layer?

* âœ… Large datasets better served from API
* âœ… Enable pricing updates without app releases
* âœ… Add caching and CDN support
* âœ… Real-time pricing synchronization

## Current Location (Web App)

/lib/construction-data/construction-data.service.ts

## Tasks

- [ ] Extract construction data to NestJS service
- [ ] Create /api/pricing endpoints
- [ ] Implement data caching strategy
- [ ] Add real-time pricing updates
- [ ] Create search and filtering endpoints

## API Endpoints to Create

* GET /api/pricing/materials - Get material costs
* GET /api/pricing/labor - Get labor rates by region
* GET /api/pricing/categories - Get pricing categories
* GET /api/pricing/search - Search pricing data

## Dependencies

* Requires ASK-12 (NestJS setup) to be completed first

## Value

Essential UK market data - 100% reusable with better performance

mobileTickets.title: ðŸ¤– Build GeminiService API endpoints

Create NestJS API endpoints for Google Gemini AI service (moved from direct mobile integration for security and performance).

* âœ… Keep API keys secure on server
* âœ… Enable rate limiting and caching
* âœ… Heavy AI processing on backend
* âœ… Better error handling

## Current Location (Web App)

/lib/ai/gemini.service.ts

## Tasks

- [ ] Extract GeminiService to NestJS controller
- [ ] Create /api/analysis endpoints
- [ ] Add image upload handling
- [ ] Implement error handling and validation
- [ ] Add rate limiting for AI calls
- [ ] Cache common analysis results

## API Endpoints to Create

* POST /api/analysis/image - Upload and analyze construction images
* POST /api/chat/message - AI chat responses
* GET /api/analysis/:id - Get analysis results

## Dependencies

* Requires ASK-12 (NestJS setup) to be completed first

## Value

Core AI differentiator - enables secure AI-powered construction analysis
